website_summaries.verdict: Offers a combination of a reasonable price, tough material, and a good fit for most with some quality concerns that could affect longevity for some pet owners.
pros: Comes in several sizes with comfortably quilted, durable material
Easy to convert from bench to hammock style on most vehicles' back seats
cons: Straps have reputation for working well at first, but breaking with normal usage
Seams have been known to fray, especially when used by larger, heavier dogs

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 70lb German Shepherd. Initially everything was fine, but in 3 months the straps to hold the cover to the back seat head rests ripped. Not only that, but because the threads are some plastic material, it disintegrated all over my seats. I had to clean to this big mess everywhere. Looks like this thing is not very durable and one little snap will leave you with a big mess to clean up. I have some pictures to attach of the damage.
customer_reviews.author: A G

customer_reviews.title: Broke after only two uses, won't buy from this maker again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover maybe a month or so, but just started using it this weekend. After only two uses the front strap has broken off where it was sewn to the plastic clip. I have two dogs, one is 60lbs and one is 13lbs. My dogs have been trained so sit calmly during car rides. I can't imagine how this would work for someone who's dogs are very energetic and move around a lot. Buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product! The attention to detail is on point. The XL fits my 2016 Nissan Titan diesel truck perfect!! There are holes for the seat belts so there is no need to put on and take off the seat cover. I have the passenger seat cover and this backseat cover and have had no problems! Completely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Luedtke

customer_reviews.title: Broke the 4th day of use. Waiting to hear back from the seller.
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this product, but until I hear back from the seller as to if we received a lemon or if it's the product itself, I can't. On our 4th day using this so it's attached to the back seat as well as the head rests on the front seat, one side of each strap to the front headrests ripped completely off. Sure, we could use it hooked solely on the back headrests and drape it on the floor, but that's not the point of this product, not to mention a new product shouldn't break so easily. I will update this review once I hear back from the company.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Gworek

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't do without it anymore
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one. Not because they don't last but we wanted one for our other car too. Really helps to keep the mess from the dogs of the seats. You will still have some dust and hair falling through the cracks but that's nothing compared to before. We also have washed it plenty of times and it holds up well. I really like the roll you put between the seats to keep the cover in place. I defiantly would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Svejuca

customer_reviews.title: XLARGE FITS 2016 GMC SIERRA CREW CAB PERFECTLY!
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 2016 GMC Sierra Crew Cab perfectly. I purchased the Extra Large version which provided coverage for the added width of the rear bench seat. The side flaps hang down the sides of the seat, and the velcro slots are great for locking a tetherS into the seat belt lockS. The anchors slip down into the bottom rear of the seat to keep the cover from pulling forward, and the straps for all of the headrest fit and work great. My Great Dane puppy slips around a bit on it, so I am going to add a blanket to help with that, but overall I am very impressed with this product and the value I'm realizing from it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice fit and well made
customer_reviews.text: my second purchase of this. I messed up the first one by putting it in the dryer :( the plastic/rubber liner shrunk and peeled off in bits and pieces. It was my bad. I ordered a diff brand for the heck of it............I returned it as it was inferior in quality. Just repurchased this Product :) I plan on line drying it or drying on AIR only in the dryer. One dislike about the dog carseat hammocks on the market>>>>>>>the hair sticks! I wish that some company would start using microfiber as the outside cover. But I get it.......this current material is breathable and less hot.
customer_reviews.author: KodiTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof Rear Bench Seat Cover
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2019 RAM 1500 Classic and the rear bench seat is approximately 61 inches wide. Most of the covers are only 54 to 56 inches wide but this one is wide enough and fits perfect. My only complaint is that the middle seat belt is not accessible. The right and left seatbelts are accessible. If the middle belt was just a lap belt then it would work. That's the only reason I give it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time figuring out how to install this thing in my Dodge RAM full size pickup. There were no instructions with it. I finally figured it out by watching a video of it on YouTube. I am happy with the product. I like the fact that it fits a full size pickup. I had something before this that was not large enough. I like that this product has flaps on the end that drop down the side. I like that it does not slide around very much due to having a bit of a rubberized back. I have not tried cleaning it yet, so I cannot rate that part of it.
customer_reviews.author: Rural Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Durable Seat Cover; Good Value:
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these for my (now) 65lb energetic puppy about 2 years ago and I'm happy to say the thing has held up really well. I leave the cover installed all the time because I never know when I may have the dog, and not only has it withstood the him and all that comes with a puppy, but it's held up to the random spills on grocery runs and other mishaps that happen in the normal course of car usage as well. I liked it so much that I purchased a second one for a different car and it's been as good as the first. I wouldn't hesitate buying a third one if needed.
customer_reviews.author: anon e. moose

customer_reviews.title: NOT waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect the leather seats in my new pickup. I have elementary age kids and a dog that ride in the back seat on a regular basis. I maintain a clean backseat, and it's more for the kids than the dog. However, today a water bottle had a slow leak, and I didn't find out for 10 minutes until our next stop. The water had completely saturated the cover, but I thought, "no worries, the covers waterproof!" Wrong. When I lifted the cover, the leather was soaked. The leak was nowhere near the seatbelt Velcro areas, so the fabric obviously isn't waterproof. Now I'm stuck trying to dry out leather seats in 10° weather...
customer_reviews.author: Plaid Flannel Guy

customer_reviews.title: Best seat cover we’ve found!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best seat cover we’ve ever found for use with our 3 dogs (1 lab and 2 German Shorthaired Pointers). We’ve used it for a few months and will be purchasing a second for our other car. The quilting is really elegant looking and the stitching has held up nicely where the cover clips to the headrests. I drive a 2016 Honda CRV and it is a perfect fit in the back seat. We put it in my husband’s 2017 Ford F-150 and, while it fit, we will be getting a size bigger for his truck.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Struett

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Both of my dogs always want to get in the front seat of our Tahoe. We used this product for the first time on a 6 hour trip. My youngest, Lacey, who is 61 pounds, found a way to be ALMOST in the front seat. Her butt was on the seat and her head....well, you can see from the photo, that she is mighty comfortable. She slept there for more than an hour! We had no issues, even with her putting a lot of pressure on the cover hanging from the headrests in the front with tearing, etc. Would definitely recommend. My other dog found a way to get underneath the cover and lay on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Durable cover for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I picked this pet cover up because I just got a new car with leather seats and was planning on traveling this summer with my two dogs. This cover was easy to install, just a couple straps that loop around the headrest, and we were ready to go. On two separate occasions, my dogs got a little sick and ended up throwing up on the cover. With a little water, I was able to wipe the mess away and there was no stains on my seats or the cover. Now that we've returned home, it's been easy to take the cover out and give it a more robust cleaning for our next big trip.
customer_reviews.author: Killer_Walrus

customer_reviews.title: Three Years Later...
customer_reviews.text: ---The fabric is in excellent shape, enduring many tumbles in the washing machine (warm water). Only complaint: two of the four plastic buckles that go around the headrests have broken (the male end). It seems the plastic is more brittle than it is flexible. It did not happen in the washer or dryer, although the dryer may have made it more brittle. Solution: knot the strap that held the male side to a Swivel Eye Snap Hook. The hook can be fastened to the female end.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Straps will unravel right away and NOT waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I have an 80 pound lab mix and drive a 2014 Camry. This is great for heavy shedders and for me because I keep my car really clean. However, the reviews saying the straps suck are TRUE. Our 3rd drive with her one of the straps unraveled. My dog does not chew and she was asleep not moving (as usual), so we know it's a faulty product and has nothing to do with her. At this point, none of the straps function and we had to tape them all to the seat. I would go with a different brand with more durable material. This is also not waterproof. Very dissapointed and ordering a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Macy Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: This product was very easy to install. One of the best features is a side flap which covers the side of the seat and protects against muddy paws. Not all similar covers have this feature. It works best if the front seats are all the way back. I'm shorter so the driver's side seat isn't all the way back, but the seat cover still works. An extra 1-2" of seat cover would be great (though not necessary for most people). Took my puppy no time at all to become comfortable with it. Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: brmsy

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2019 Toyota Tacoma.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2019 Toyota Tacoma great. It does have a nice anti-skid bottom, but does not have it where it contacts the back of the seat. I just put it in so I can't say how well it will hold up, but hopefully it is longer than some of the reviews say. At this price point I figure it won't be a bad buy. If it starts tearing up I'll post an update if it's within a year. If you don't see an update it at least lasted that long...
customer_reviews.author: R. Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Purchased, loved, then purchased again
customer_reviews.text: I’ve looked and used numerous covers and this one is the best for size, weight, fit and ease of cleaning. The material is good quality and it looks like something an OEM would make for new cars at a dealership. I’m impressed with how well it stays in place with the tacky bottom yet machine washable. This is the second one I’ve ordered so I have one for my wife’s car as well. The only thing I wish it had was latches on the sides so you can hook it onto side door handles to protect your door handles, but it does protect the side of the seats and has hooks to latch onto front seats so pets can’t fall.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this seat cover! We have two stinky mutts who love to go for rides in the car and this works perfectly! I will say that when they were puppies, we lined the underneath with pee mats and one of them did pee in the car, and a little did get through onto the mat. I would definitely recommend lining the seat with some type of absorbent mat if you have a puppy or dog with a small bladder. Other than that, I would definitely recommend this item and have just purchased a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Carissa

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered SEVERAL sets for our pereonal and work vehicles. The main thing that caught my eye was the waterprrof feature. Today that was tested and they are NOT waterproof. There's nothing like having to clean up runny poop off you seat that seeped through the cover!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: Great seat saver
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Fits my CRV perfectly. Must be pretty high tpi, as the weave is so tight he doesn’t catch his nails on it like he does with everything else ! Spilled the water from his bowl and he was able to lap it up off the seat, no absorption at all. Have only had to wipe it clean so far (and it cleans easily) will update if I ever have to fully “wash” it. Oh, I don’t use the hammock hook up (he’s big enough, doesn’t need it) unless I have cargo on the floor, then it’s a nice cover-up: with dogs; out of sight, out of mind, works great that way.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great performance!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect the backseat of my BMW 330i from dog hair, claw marks and a little dirt. My pit bull had other plans for it when he took a giant dump on it going 55 MPH down a rural highway. 10 minutes later I arrived home to clean up the mess to find it protected my seat IMMACULATELY! It did such a good job and is so affordable that I just threw the “soiled” one away and I’m here to buy another! So, if you’re looking for something that can stand the test of a pit bull blow out, look no further! You’ve found your car seat cover!
customer_reviews.author: D. Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: Would also be nice to have a zipper on the front side to ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally found one that fits my Chevy impala limited ltz. Others the straps did not line up with back seat headrests. I am only giving it 2 stars though because i can not buckle the straps around my rear headrests, there is not enough strap included to go fully around them. I have stationary headrests, they do not go up or down. Would also be nice to have a zipper on the front side to open between front seats when used as a hammock. Can not find a way to contact the barksbar company. No response
customer_reviews.author: Sheber

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs and they are active and often messy or dirty. I had my car detailed and didn't want the cloth seats to get messed up so I purchased this seat cover for the back seat (plus two for the front seats). They are machine washable but I've already had to remove the back seat cover and shake it out-- all of the dirt and debris shook right off. They look great and seem to be staying in place fairly well. I'm glad I bought these and have already had compliments, even though they've been in my car less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: sandalwood217

customer_reviews.title: GREAT pet safe seat cover!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great seat cover/hammock as I call it. Please measure your backseat before ordering. I have a new full size Chevy Pick up with 4 full sized doors. The seat cover is a couple inches shy on both sides of completely covering the top of the back seat. My fault, not the sellers. It stills works for me. What a great way to keep your seat clean and more importantly to keep your pet safe! I love that it stays firmly on the seat. It does not slide around. You won't be disappointed! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Great dog hammock!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second seat cover, first one from this maker. So far, it has stood up to the wear and 2 dogs and several washings. The first one from a different company started falling apart after the second wash, where as this one, no problems! So easy to attach to the seat of the car! 1, 2, 3, and you are ready to transport your dog to wherever you are headed. Saves your car from hair, spills, and doggie accidents, Washes like a dream. Might get a second one, just in case we need one in a hurry, bit this hammock is just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: SusanManke

customer_reviews.title: Poorly fabricated.
customer_reviews.text: This was suppose to be a great deal but literally in 2 weeks it started ripping by the seams and one of the snap buckle broke.
customer_reviews.author: Antony Rollo

customer_reviews.title: Not Meant for Large Dogs.
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice and convenient to put on. MY only problem is that my 70 lb. dog put his legs right over it and onto the console. I took the straps off of the front seats and just let it lay down. I am keeping it, but had to put a cover on my front seat, too (which is where he prefers to sit). Great quality. I think this would be GREAT for a small or medium size dog.
customer_reviews.author: Renee M.

customer_reviews.title: The cover itself is great quality but...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in January, so about six months ago. The cover is very durable and well made, but for some reason one of the straps that goes around the headrest and holds the cover in place just broke. Going to look into our options now.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Safe, clean and easily installed and removed.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Tundra nicely, could be an inch or 2 wider but seat is covered. Using the hammock setup, slamming on the brakes doesn't send the dogs flying. They just roll up on the side of the hammock. Easy to put groceries under the seat so dogs can't nose around. Easy to connect and disconnect if access to under seat storage is necessary. For the price, functionality and ease of use, I highly recommend this seat cover.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Escape artist
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent idea & I have to agree with most reviews. I don't know if it's our vehicle, Ford Escape or our 95-lb GSD, but during every ride he manages to get underneath repeatedly resting his head on the console tween driver and passenger. The flaps on either side do not tuck down very far causing them to come loose while he ventures from window to window and then allowing "Houdini" to venture into his under cover escapades.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Held up great
customer_reviews.text: 3,000 miles, 3 1/2 days held up amazing! Easy installation, non slip, seemed to make the ride easier on my 2 potties. I purchased the XL for my 2012 dodge ram 1500. I had ample room width wise with more to spare of needed. Length wise it covered the bench seat and the flaps went almost all the way down the sides. Only con. I wish three was a way to secure the side flaps, the tended to get under the hammock when the pup os would get in. The last photo is what fur made out to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Me too

customer_reviews.title: This product has done a great job preserving my car seats from the messy dog ...
customer_reviews.text: This product has done a great job preserving my car seats from the messy dog AND keeping the dog from falling between the seats in the car! He basically has his own little "hammock" now and loves lounging comfortably in the backseat on road trips. Pros: Easy to assemble/install, colors blend in well with the backseat, non-skid bottom is helpful for keeping it in place, effectively keeps the dog mess off of the seats! Cons: unsure how well it would hold up in the washing machine, the straps (for the headrests) do stretch out a little over time (to be expected)
customer_reviews.author: step0912

customer_reviews.title: If buying for a big dog find something else, this failed.
customer_reviews.text: I have a giant breed do that weighs 137 pounds. I drive a car that has an eight inch seat gap. The bar the straps thread through on the clips that go around the front seat headrests both broke. I tied knots in the straps to reconnect them (I was traveling at the time) and the buckles to the clips failed. This product was only used once a month for short periods of time. If you have a big dog look for a different product because these failed way too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: NaPaAs

customer_reviews.title: Does not slide around
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install and the handle for between the top and bottom of the seats keeps the cover from sliding. I do not put the seats up often so not sure how much it will need to be adjusted after doing so. I went with the standard size even though we have a supercrew f150. The length of the cover is just a couple inches too short so the side flaps end up covering a very small portion on the top of the seat. Husband was fine with that so we kept the cover instead of ordering the larger version.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality is going down. :-(
customer_reviews.text: This is my second car seat cover from BarksBar. First one was exactly the same model and it lasted two years. That was okay with me, because it sees use every day and dog's claws are doing some wear and tear. The second one was reduced to threads in less than SIX MONTHS. Same product, same little Corgi. Obviously our second seat cover was much worse quality. I really think that anything less than a year worth of use is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Rustichetto

customer_reviews.title: Good product - very happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: Fits the back seat of my Jeep Wrangler Unlimited perfectly. So far it appears to be durable, well constructed and should be easy to clean. My Golden Retriever doesn't slip and slide around on it, and it remains securely affixed to the seat via the plastic dohickeys that push between the cushions and the straps attached to the seat backs (front and back). I particularly like that it will protect Bailey from a fall between the seats should I hit the brakes (which has happened). I am happy that it has a zipper that will allow his occasional visits to the front or accommodate a person sitting on one side and Bailey on the other. Very satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Hillz

customer_reviews.title: Our dog couldn't be happier!  Neither can we!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase; we live close to one of the national parks, and love to bring our pup on hikes. What we DON'T love is cleaning the leftovers of muddy paws off of the seat. We actually bought this because we have a new car, and decided that, for the price, it would give us peace of mind. And it has done so. Easy to "install" and remove, so cleaning it is a breeze, and of course the dog couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Misha

customer_reviews.title: Kept my backseat clean!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at the quality and durability of this product. I used it to travel to Ohio and back to AZ with a 14 week old puppy. We went to the beach, swimming and all the road miles. When I took the cover off to clean it(hosed it off) my back seat and floor were as clean as the day I put it on. I am very impressed! Just wish the ends extended up the doors to the window. Very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Walton

customer_reviews.title: So glad we bought this!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously one of the best products we have purchased for our dog/truck. This thing stays in place, the dog doesn't mind it, it's easy to transport between vehicles, and it's easy to clean. When we need to clean it, we take it out and hose it down. We love it so much, we are going to buy another for our new Rogue. We bought the XL for our 2013 Dodge Ram 1500 pickup truck. Highly recommend this even if you're dog is in the car for errands and nothing else. We take ours to the dog park, camping, etc and we love having this thing when her paws are muddy :)
customer_reviews.author: A. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, does not hold up to use!
customer_reviews.text: This seemed great at first. It kept my dogs in the back seat and kept my seat from getting filthy but after less than 9 months of intermittent use the straps are totally disintegrating. They are so bad that when I touch them they leave a fine black powder all over my hands and they can't be hooked anymore so the cover is now useless until I have new straps sewn onto it.
customer_reviews.author: MeadowlarkMT

customer_reviews.title: it is very good quLity. Stitching is supurb
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the larger size, as the many other reviews that I read, stated the regular size was too small for other suv's. It is wayyyy to big for my car. I have an Equinox and should have purchased the regular sized option. Overall, it is very good quLity. Stitching is supurb. It is thick and quilted. Definately recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle T

customer_reviews.title: Straps fell apart in to time ...
customer_reviews.text: The actual product is durable and works well, but I have now bought 3 of these within a year and all the straps have broken and completely unraveled in no time at all. My dog just sits in the back seat, too ... it’s not like she is jumping around and putting pressure on the straps. I would pay a few extra bucks for a more durable one next time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best budget seat cover I've found to date (15 years a Viszla owner).
customer_reviews.text: This seat provides superior coverage/protection for the seat and is WAY easier to clean/less prone to accumulating dog hair than the 3 or 4 others I've used over the last 15 years. My application is the back seat of my Jeep Wrangler that is normally dedicated to 2 Vizslas (copious shedding of tiny red hair that embeds into upholstery / carpet). This seat cover is a HUGE step forward in simplifying the maintenance of a back seat suitable for humans and still at a bargain price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen W.

customer_reviews.title: Pet car seat cover
customer_reviews.text: One of the straps broke, also material traps dog hair, you cannot shake it out well
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: Love the Car Seat Cover!!! One of the best inventions and purchases I've made!!!
customer_reviews.text: I finally was able to use the seat cover when I took my 2 dogs (a Border Collie & Australian Shepherd - very hairy!!) for a hike last weekend. They weren't sure about it initially when jumping into the car; but, think they felt more secure with the hammock layout. Installed in seconds over the headrests and I loved the little side flaps that keep even the sides of the seat free of dirt and dog hair. I highly recommend this to all who take their pets hiking and worry about the dirt afterwards; or just love having their dogs travel with them and hate the hair on your seats and backs of your seats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More than happy with this seat cover.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this cover for about a year now. For reference, I have a Fiesta hatchback and I have a German Shepherd Husky mix that's about 100 pounds and a dachshund mix who is 17 pounds. They've gone for many rides and haven't tore it, it's easily wiped down, it does definitely seem water resistant. It's very nice quality and feels really good. I really like the flaps on the side, they protect the sides of my seat when they jump into the car.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Keep my back seat clean
customer_reviews.text: I have a Dodge Ram 3500 and this keeps my 2 Springer Spaniels off the rear seats, yet makes clean up easy when they are off it. just use a small hand broom. Very sturdy and was super easy to install. It is water proof, as far as I can tell. My girls go in wet, but my seats remain dry. I would highly recommend this product for dog owners.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fiore

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick seat cover. Nice rubberized backing. Strong straps to loop over the head rests, I wish the straps were a little longer. They really don't fit over the head rest in the back of my 2016 Charger without a struggle and squashing the headrests. I'd give more stars if it fit the rear headrest better. The straps fit over the front headrest fine. I use the seat cover as a hammock for my yellow lab. Of course the dog wants to go under the cover when entering the car but that's not the fault the product just a confused pooch.
customer_reviews.author: P. Dubuque

customer_reviews.title: Design Flaws.
customer_reviews.text: There are clear benefits, but the drawbacks resulted in me removing it from my car. My dogs couldn't get traction on it and would struggle as I drove around corners. It also amplifies heat, and if both sides are secured, it gets far to hot to use in the summertime for simple outings because it cuts the flow of air off. That said, I'm not sure if there is a better one out there. These might be drawbacks to all covers for dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: great product! fits perfectly in the backseat of my ...
customer_reviews.text: great product! fits perfectly in the backseat of my mom's honda accord. all the straps are very secure and the cover itself is nicely designed with great padding. i've only had it for a week but it just survived the first snow storm and kept the car nice and clean. afterwards, i was able to wipe the cover down and looks brand new. the material seems very durable. I have a bernese mountain dog and he's 12 months old, 110 lbs so he's all over the back seat of the car and tries to practially drive the car. this seat cover helped contain him to the back seat and so far has withstood his weight, claws and puppy personality.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use, good quality material.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, it was extremely easy to put on the back seats. Clips on right around the head rests. Perfect size for my Mazda 3. My dog Zeus is a lab/husky mix. He sheds from time to time and this kept all the hair off the seats. Great price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Daviel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect & durable for my Nissan Rogue!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this seat cover for 9 months, and it is still going strong! It is still in just as good of shape as when I bought it. No rips or tears, even with frequent use and a 45lb dog who likes to be as close to the front seat as possible. He is definitely not gentle on the straps, and they are still perfect! Wipes clean easily after muddy paws and really does a great job of protecting my leather seats and keeping the pup out of the front seat. Love this cover!
customer_reviews.author: Alyson S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any car
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for something to keep the dog hair at bay in my car (a compact) for a long time. In the interim I resorted to using a sheet (not the best results). My daughter bought one of these for her SUV and I loved it. It's incredibly easy to install, can be transferred from car to car and has been a huge help when it comes to messes. It's easy to wash and will be a long standing favorite for many future road trips.
customer_reviews.author: RogueSoaper

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Bullsh*t this is waterproof. My dog ended up peeing in the backseat and it soaked through into the seats. We ended up needing to get a ozone generator to get the smell out.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to attach.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many things, but I really like this. Fairly light weight, so it's easy to do by yourself. I have also bought a tether to keep her from pacing. I like that I can use it for a sling if I have to. But is a very good cover. I just ordered a 2nd one for the other car. I also like the fact you can tuck it in between the back rest and seat. It keeps it from moving so much. I still have to straighten it some when she gets out. But that's her, not the car seats fault. But she hasn't managed to pull it off!
customer_reviews.author: Donna R. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, the non skip backing works well over the Leather seats. It attaches to headrests front and back seats and a tuck in bars holds the cover in place ( Against seat back) slits for seatbelts are a plus. When braking hard, our 115# B&T Coonhound, no longer goes flying into front seats or falling between front and bask seat. We have a Prius and bought the shorter of the two, and it fits like a glove. This is probably one of the best things we have purchased in a long time. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Wood

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install and Great Coverage
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one of these for my Ford Edge a couple years ago. So easy to use and keeps seats in tip-top shape despite my dog having access to the back seat. Liked it so much that I bought one for my daughter's new Ford Fusion. I first bought another brand and did not like it at all; returned it and purchased our second Barksbar seat cover. Actually, this is our second Barksbar for the back seat, but we also have seat covers for our front seats from Barksbar. Worth every penny! I won't waste money on another brand ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This wasn't bad. It lasted less than a year before it ...
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't bad. It lasted less than a year before it started to tear at the seams around the beck rest buckles. Our dog is 45pounds so he's not huge or super heavy, just love to rest his head on the part between the sits and it didn't hold up. We also have a check Silverado and it didn't reach fully to both ends of the backseat so we always had a strip of the seats not covered and fur got under there all the time. The only thing this was good for catching was the drool since it doesn't stop the fur. Probably would be much better on a shorter back seat than a full size truck's though.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: *****IT'S NOT WATERPROOF*****I was very disappointed in this seat cover
customer_reviews.text: *****IT'S NOT WATERPROOF*****I was very disappointed in this seat cover. I only bought it to protect my leather seats in my Yukon, as I've recently purchased a puppy. Well the first time she piddled it went through the waterproof cover and got on my seat. The straps are fraying. I'm not happy with this purchase at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amie

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Durable, & Perfect Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought the standard size. Fits our 2015 Pilot perfectly. So far so good. I really like the handles it has attached to the underside to tuck inbetween the seats. The side flaps are nice too, especially with our dog jumping in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Really fits well
customer_reviews.text: I like the hammock when I have the dog in the car. When I have to transport a person in the back seat, I just unsnap the front seat and the cover falls nicely over the edge of the back seat. Nothing to trip on. Seat cover not wrinkled. Liked it so much I bought a second cover for my husband's car. Highly recommend plus great value.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta S. Bloom

customer_reviews.title: A lot of coverage for my sedan
customer_reviews.text: I tried multiple products. I have a regular sized sedan and wanted something big to cover everything. I tried other products for big cars but they never gave me the coverage I wanted. This product, however, is perfect if you want to cover almost everything in the backseat. My dogs get extremely dirty after a day in the park. So it was perfect fit for my car and dogs :)
customer_reviews.author: goxmina

customer_reviews.title: Works for keeping shedding under control but the clips break easily.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Husky who sheds like crazy and this works well for keeping the car somewhat clean. However, the clips are cheap plastic. I've had this for about 4 months. Two have already had half of them break. My Husky is very well behaved in the car too. She sits quietly or lays down in the car, so it's not like they are getting crazy amounts of tension from a dog running or jumping. Would go with something higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, fits well, feels like good quality, no complaints. I have a Honda Fit for reference. Bought this for the back and 2 of "BarksBar Pet Front Seat Cover for Cars" for the front, so I knew the color and the texture would all match. Very happy with my purchases. (FYI: There are slots for seatbelts, so people can ride in the back. When velcroed down, they practically disappear.)
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Goldie Approved!
customer_reviews.text: My Golden Retriever Lucy and I tool around our beach town with her safe, secure and comfortable in her Barksbar backseat sling. I'm sitting pretty on a matching seat cover also available from these fine folks. We can play on the beach, go surfing, or play in the park on a stormy day and no worry about harming the interiors of our 4Runner or our new RAV4. Excellent product, fair price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Mike

customer_reviews.title: Wow, better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I work at a store where we sell other name brands of covers like these, and they fit nowhere as nice as this one, and are 2-3 times the price as well. I figured I would give this one a try, and if it didn't fit well I would return it. For the price, it was an easy decision. I installed this yesterday, and it fit so much better than I expected. I am more than pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Shanester

customer_reviews.title: Great for protecting your seats
customer_reviews.text: I call this the taco tarp because that's what it looks like fully installed. I love it, I put the pupper in the back seat and I have no concerns about claw marks or dirt. Throw it in washer or hose it down. Always line dry. Wish I had this when my kid was little because it would saved so much clean up time. It has slots for seatbelts straps which close tightly with velcro when not in use, so great for carseats. Doritos and teddygrams be damned. Good for puppers and kids...maybe both.
customer_reviews.author: Diana E. Herrera

customer_reviews.title: BarksBar Luxury Pet Car Seat Cover
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this type of cover before so I didn't know what to expect. It serves the purpose and seems to be durable. It is rather stiff and the part the goes up on the backsides of the front seat just slops down in front of the seat if you don't want to use it as a hammock. It would be nice if it had some way to roll it and tie it so it can be out of the way. I do like the waterproof feature, I don't really need it for the dogs, I need it for elderly parents. It works great for that.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it once but it was ripped after a couple of years for putting it in the laundry too much... Replaced it with an expensive cover, which I threw away after 1 week because it was unstable - now bought this one again! Fits the car, stable (even without connecting the front part), and relatively durable. Can be used once in a while in the laundry - but that would obviously start reducing its durability...
customer_reviews.author: Dean Kormas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the quality of this seat cover. This cover fits my 2016 Subaru Forester. I researched many covers and found this one equal to $100 covers. It can be adjusted to fit the height of the backseat and has two toggles, on the backside, that stuff into the bottom of your seat so the cover does not slide off the seat. The fabric is sturdy and will be an excellent way to keep the mud and dirt off of my seats. Both of my dogs shed so the section that attaches to the back of the driver and passenger side will help keep the fur from getting onto the floor and every nook and cranny. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Worth Every Penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've purchased a car seat cover. The first one (a different brand), was probably the least costly I could find, and only had it a couple of weeks before it developed a big rip in the fabric. This time, I am so glad I spent a little extra money to get this one!! It is so worth it to get one that has the quilted multiple layers for longevity, and all the features that keep it in place, just where you want it. This is a fantastic product, and I most certainly would buy it again (only this time I'm sure I'll be good for for at least a few years!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sailing Barry

customer_reviews.title: Rips easily- very low quality
customer_reviews.text: At first we loved this so much we got a second one. It was easy to install and kept our seats clean and dry. However, I wish I would have waited because after 1 month of use it has ripped a 7" hole through the back. Wish it would have lasted a lot longer than it did-disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Stewarts

customer_reviews.title: Great, but can't use the center seatbelt.
customer_reviews.text: Good stitching, strong buckles, the hammock keeps the dog from coming over the seat and actually offers a nice place for the dog to rest her head. However, I can't use my center seatbelt because it is a shoulder belt not a lap belt and it folds down the seat cover. A zipper running up the seat cover would fix this. I found a seat cover that had this, but it was $80! I could probably get a seamstress to add a strong zipper for much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: AndrewPW

customer_reviews.title: Just What We Needed for Our Fur Baby and at the Right Price
customer_reviews.text: When we saw the BarksBar Luxury Pet Car Seat Cover, we knew it was what we needed for the SUV. Our girl was leaving fur all over the seats she sat/lay on, the backs of the front seats and on the carpet. It was difficult to sweep it and get it all off the seats. The cover was easy to install and she is very comfortable on it. When needed, we just detach the cover from the headrests and pull it out to give it a shake and voila, ready to go back into the SUV. Love this product and we highly recommend it. Also, the price was very affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Terry A. Ontiveros

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid dog car seat cover
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2017 KIA Sportage and the cover fits great. Very easy to install and uninstall and folds back up easily back into its pouch for easy storage. My dog seems to like the cover as well. She stayed on it and did not try to chew it or pull it off. I have not used it as a hammock yet and probably won't as my dog is medium-large and don't want to risk it. It does seem well-made and looks like it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent seat protection
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been excellent for my back seat. My car has cloth seats, and gets filthy with my two dogs. It is slightly large in my sedan and sags a bit in the middle, but that doesn't matter when both dogs are sitting in it. It helps keep the seats clean(er), is easy to wash, and is somewhat of a barrier from the front of the car so the dogs can't easily climb up there or fall off the bench when you brake.
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: May be adequate for light shedders
customer_reviews.text: This product is made of pretty sturdy material. Will definitely keep water, fur and dust from getting into your seats. However, the fabric itself is not very comfortable and my dog actually does not like to sit on it. In fact, from time to time he tries to dig through the fabric to get to the softer seat underneath. In addition, the fur that gets caught up in the seat cover is almost impossible to remove. It sticks very well and no amount of brushing or scraping will completely clean it. In fact the static from using a brush will just cause all of the fur to cling right back onto the cover.
customer_reviews.author: RMac

customer_reviews.title: great product with small but significant flaws
customer_reviews.text: This product is made very well, that is to say that that the material used to protect your vehicle interior is very strong and does its job well. HOWEVER, it is very weak where it counts the most and that is in the small clasps that hold the support straps in place. After only three uses, the small buckles have broken and I now have to search for alternative replacement clips. I hope this helps others in there search for a sear cover and hope that I can find some help in fixing these broken clasps.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for reducing hair
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lifesaver for my new car’s backseat. My dogs love going places with me and they were so disappointed when I got my new car until I got this canopy for them. It helps reduce the hair in my car significantly, I just shake it out after our trip, but my older dog is smart so he knows how to get underneath it and poke his way to the front seat. Even with the seatbelt harness on, he was still able to get underneath the canopy. I’ll still always use it though because it does reduce the hair!
customer_reviews.author: TinaB

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my car clean!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs that really shed. When I needed to take any of them to the vets, I knew I would have to vacuum out my car as soon as I got home. I decided to purchase this to see if it would help and it works beautifully. It is extremely to install, my pets like laying on it, and all that dog hair now stays on the pet cover rather then in my car. Im kicking myself that I didnt get this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this. I have leather seats and I wanted to protect them from my big goofy pitbull since he can't sit still (just of note, I ordered two for the front seats too). I spill stuff in my car all the time and it is definitely water resistant. I also loved how easy it was to install. Very good quality, definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: megbubbster

customer_reviews.title: Just installed
customer_reviews.text: Now, this seat cover replaces a similar cover that lasted a few years with my 90 lb black lab. The previous cover was not quilted. This one is very well made and thicker, I did sew in 2 about 10" Velcro straps to the sides of the back to keep it from puckering between the headrests. (But that's just my preference, I did the same to the last cover) The Velcro naturally sticks to the felt-type back of seats. Fits perfectly in my 2012 Scion xB. I'm sure I'll get a few years out of this cover too!
customer_reviews.author: April Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Functional but a little noisy
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the functionality of the seat cover. It attaches to the back and front head rests and stays in place nicely. It,s keeping my back seat and the back of my front seats hair free. We can still see her nicely and she can see up front. My only negative is the fabric is noisy/scratchy when my dog moves around which is q little annoying for her and us.
customer_reviews.author: C. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Like it...mostly
customer_reviews.text: This pad is well made and installs nicely. May be that my truck is too big but I did find it a bit difficult to line the Velcro up with the buckles and the upper straps with the headrests. I will likely only use it for camping or other trips in which I don’t have all of my kids because the center belt is unusable with it in place. Otherwise I would have liked to leave it in place to protect my seats from the kids too.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy mom

customer_reviews.title: Livesaver
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a habit of jumping into the front seat with me on our car rides. We take 8 hour drives together about once a month, so I had to find some kind of solution. This car seat cover has been a life saver! Not only does it stop him from jumping into the front, it also avoids and damage to my leather seats. As you can see in the pictures, it also triples as a GREAT headrest for dogs lol! Archie loves hanging out on the divider :)
customer_reviews.author: Shea Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Seat anchors dont work as described
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2017 F150, the seat anchor bars dont work in my truck as decribed, there is nothing to hold the bars in place. THe use of the center seat belt is non exsistent. I am not going to be taking this out out everytime I want seat 3 people in the back. What a horrible design from a function stand point overall.
customer_reviews.author: rmturner54

customer_reviews.title: Saving my car seats!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple - installs in a flash (I've got a Corolla, but I see it fitting just about any sedan), and does a great job of finally managing the fur and muddy paw prints I was always battling. I think my dog actually prefers the back seat with this now, because he can't fall down in that leg gap in front of the seats. The rubber grip material on the under side does a good job of preventing the cover from slipping around, even with the 80lbs fur baby moving around.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Kine

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Stand the Test of Time
customer_reviews.text: Bought this seat cover in early March of 2020 (now July 31, 2020). My car has stayed in the garage with the exception of two weeks since then. I moved this seat cover to my other vehicle today, and one of the straps securing the cover to the back seat had dry rotted. The plastic snap broke clean off the strap, because the strap is falling to pieces. The cover was great for protecting my leather seats, but it does not stand the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Emily W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and actually stays in place
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and actually stays in place! I have a Husky and he moves around a lot in the car so I really appreciate that it stays in place. I have a Honda Civic hatchback and the seat cover fits perfectly. I was concerned that it was going to be too small when I opened the package but the fit is perfect. If you have a larger vehicle I recommend you size up. Been using this a month and no conderns or complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifersdoglife

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover!
customer_reviews.text: I love it so far. Have had it a few weeks. Have had my dog on it a couple of times. It appears to be well built and it fits very well. I have had it in my Jeep Cherokee and our Toyota Tacoma and it fits both vehicles well. I like that the retainers keep it tucked on the seat well. The material is easy to clean/vacuum. I like that you can have the front side of the cover up for more of a barricade to keep the pet in the backseat, but also can put it down so people can sit.
customer_reviews.author: The Organized One

customer_reviews.title: High quality but too slippery and blocks all seatbelts
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this seat protector is excellent, so I have to give the manufacturer credit but there were two problems: (1) The material is slippery and my dog was sliding around on it. (2) You no longer have access to any of the seatbelt buckles down by the seats. Not only could I not buckle my German SHepherd's harness in (safety first!), but my kids couldn't ride in the car. I wanted this to work, but I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: JMHO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect so far!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it! I've had it a week. It seems super durable, made well, and out of quality material. I use my car a little different than most. I walk dogs and also take dogs to park in my car. So to not get my car trashed, I fold my backseats down and drape the hammock over the front head rests then hook the back to my spare tire compartment panel (see pix). It fits perfectly. I have a Nissan Juke if that helps. I purchased another brand and had it a full year until it LITERALLY fell apart. I hope this one lasts longer, well see! [...]
customer_reviews.author: Amber Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: So easy to put on and really help keeps the seats clean
customer_reviews.text: I have a big 90lbs American Bulldog mix and she loves riding in the car. The only down side is she SHEDS so much and tracks crap in on her feet. I have had seat covers before that were a pain in the butt to put on and they always popped off. This seat protector was so easy to put on!! It stays in place!! It keeps hair off the seats AND floor boards. If I need to clean it, super easy to unclip it, shake it off or vacuum it. I would recommend this to everyone :)
customer_reviews.author: Irish Lass

customer_reviews.title: Must have if your dogs go in vehicles regularly. 😁😁🙏
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic...a must have if you have long haired dogs, that insist on going with you. I've got a German Shepherd and a Husky.... I love taking them in truck, but HATED cleaning up hair. With this, hair stays contained and it's easy to vaccum out, or just take out and shake it.😁
customer_reviews.author: Ray Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Good item, good price, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is in our 2017 Prius V and it fits great. Full coverage. Don't use it for dogs, just the kids and carrying stuff. With this in (I just keep it in, I simply don't worry about drive-throughs, or boxes, or whatever in the back seat. Seat belts work well with this. Nice thick cloth, not stiff or plasticy. Kids like it, and with the dark interior, this pretty much goes unnoticed. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Great seat saver when you have dogs!!!
customer_reviews.text: Took a long trip with 3 dogs- this seat cover was a lifesaver!! Also, took them to the beach & the seat cover was covered in sand!! Just shook it out, then washed in a cold delicate wash with a few minutes in a cool dryer. Then hung it out to completely dry. LOVE IT!!!! I did place a lightweight blanket between the seat & the seat cover since I read some peoples' complaints about black coming off onto their seats. I have not had any issues!!
customer_reviews.author: P. Malinowski

customer_reviews.title: GSD Approved
customer_reviews.text: I waited several weeks before writing this review to offer a better description and evaluation of the product. This product was purchased to protect a GMC Terrain from two family German Shepherds who are frequent travelers. The specific concerns I had before my purchase was the size and the clamping system. I was extremely pleased with the product quality and how well it protected the vehicle seats. In addition to the protection it provided excellent comfort for our furry family members and made everyone's travel experience better. If you are researching a seat cover for your pet this is one you should seriously consider.
customer_reviews.author: gib3

customer_reviews.title: I wish this was a little heigher
customer_reviews.text: I have a new, younger dog who loves to try and get into the front seat. This is a good barrier to make it hard for her but I still have to push her back. I wish it was higher on the sides so she wasn't able to get over easier. As for the protection of my seats - this is a great product. I can put things in the seat wells without her being able to get to them.
customer_reviews.author: CLENicolee

product_meta.title: BarksBar Luxury Pet Car Seat Cover with Seat Anchors for Cars, Trucks, and Suv's - Black, Waterproof & Nonslip Backing
feature_bullets: Black & Hammock Convertible: 54" x 58": Designed for the backseats of Standard Cars, Trucks, & SUVs. Easily convertible between hammock or standard bench coverage. Bench section of the seat cover is designed with 7" SIDE-FLAPS extensions for extra coverage to the side of your seat cushions.

Waterproof: Made with high quality heavy-duty waterproof polyester for durability and comfortability. Include Built-in Velcro Openings for your seatbelts and Seat Anchors to prevent the seat cover from sliding around.
Protects BackSeats From Dirt, Spills, Scratches, Hair & Fur, And Other Messes. Two Pockets included for easy storing of personal items such as toys, leashes, grooming supplies, water bottle. etc.

Designed with Color-Fast material to prevent color bleeding and premium components FREE OF AZO Dyes and HEAVY Metals such as arsenic, lead, mercury, etc. Also tested to withstand EXTREME temperatures so you will never have to worry about damage to your vehicles anymore.
Very Easy To Install - Just Snap the Buckle Straps Around Your Headrests and Tuck In The Seat Anchors. Very Easy to Install and Clean - Machine Washable: Use Gentle Cycle.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
